name: Banjo
description: Banjo is a savory hybrid cross of Boost and Tangelo. This stimulating flower is a perfect option for enhancing mood and improving outlook. It emits an odd aroma of freshly grated cheese and tangerine zest, but the flavor is sweet and piney. After this strain’s euphoria has settled, the slow body melt begins. This moderate sedation is enjoyable and functional, weighing just slightly on the eyelids and limbs. Enjoy Banjo throughout the day to improve mood and mellow nagging aches and pains.
descriptionPlain: Banjo is a savory hybrid cross of Boost and Tangelo. This stimulating flower is a perfect option for enhancing mood and improving outlook. It emits an odd aroma of freshly grated cheese and tangerine zest, but the flavor is sweet and piney. After this strain’s euphoria has settled, the slow body melt begins. This moderate sedation is enjoyable and functional, weighing just slightly on the eyelids and limbs. Enjoy Banjo throughout the day to improve mood and mellow nagging aches and pains.

highlightedReviews.text:
Banjo [H]
(Boost [H] × Tangelo [H])
method - flower by canabiotix
effects - uplifted, focussed, relaxed, creative, alert, calm 
for - sleep! stress and anxiety. not a complete painkiller. for insomnia and for just zoning out while still being productively conscience. wouldnt say light or clear headed, but somewhere in the middle
smell- at first, i said amonia, diesel, pungent, kush. after cracking a nug, strong mango, banana, juicyfruit smell. it is impossible to place this scent, although nostalgiac and recognizeable in an unexplainable way, like a de ja vu, or something on the tip of your tongue. Sour for sure
taste- true to its cannabiotix grower, that signature soft orange-flavor profile. mango all the way, it literally takes residence in your mouth long aftet smoking. Tangerine in a sour way like those mango altoid candies
look- wow. darker from a distance, hybrid bud structure for sure, a condensed, cookies looking nug on the outside, that breaks up almost  perfect- light and airy and seems to break up endlessly. my fingers were so keefed up with that deep dry sticky that is difficult to get off- and there was SO much of it, legit took me a minute to rub most of it off so I could roll the joint. i cant leave out how jam pack stuffed every cookies looking,  OGs & kush tasting nugs are: the trychomes are the perfect size, and the inside of this flower was high times quality, truly art to stare at.
> loving it. hybrid on steroids.. smoked this on a tragic day, and honestly its a real true sense of calm and keeping my mind from slipping into a depression. this is not for rookies. aftertaste is like a chamelion
Look [10/10]
Taste [8.5/10]
Smell [8/10]
Lineage [8/10]
High [9/10]
43.5/50

This strain will knock you on your butt if you take too much. Helps with insomnia, relaxes you while taking your pain away. A little cloudy but nothing you can't handle. Definitely great for sex!! I just finished working in the bedroom and I must say this strain brought the animal out of me, definitely recommend this strain.
